metadata.name: xDeparturex—Act I—xStationx
metadata.description:
INT/EXT xStationx—Day—MASTER
—James and Sam depart from station—

                                          (Sam V.O.)
When people settle, innovation stops. Complacency leads to inaction, and inaction leaves things as they always were—boring, slow, inefficient. An idea can spark a whole world of change, blossoming outward like a sunburst. Solutions start as ideas in the mind, then words and sketches in a notebook. From here, life begins and grows outward from a simple thought. Action.
